entry.title: Dynabrade 67912 - 2 X 60 L Three Wheel Belt Grinder 1.5 Hp 115 V 1 Phase 60 Frequency 800-8000 Sfpm (244-2438 Sm/Min)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Grinders
Price: 5954.85

[shortdesc]
  • 2 Inch (51 mm) W x 60 Inch (1,524 mm) L Three Wheel Belt Grinder
  • 1.5 hp, 115 V, 1 Phase, 60 Frequency, 800-8,000 SFPM (244-2,438 SM/Min)
  • This Dynabrade Bench & Pedestal Belt Grinder is a versatile three-wheel belt grinding machine
  • It powers abrasive belts that are 2 Inch wide by 60 Inch long (51 mm x 1,524 mm).
  • Dynabrade Bench & Pedestal Belt Grinder is ideal for a variety of applications, including grinding, deburring, finishing, shaping, fitting, plus removing flash and parting lines
  • Machine design allows smooth grinding from contact wheel, and sanding or finishing from slack of belt
  • Offered in complete range of electrical configurations.
  • Amazing versatility ? grind from contact wheel or platen
  • finish from slack of belt
  • Fully guarded to meet all OSHA standards
  • Work rest is adjustable to ensure accurate angle grinding.
  • Quick and easy belt change minimizes downtime and increases efficiency
  • Can be bench-mounted or attached to optional 67500 Pedestal Stand, as shown
  • Pedestal Stand offers height adjustment of 28 Inch (711mm) to 38 Inch (965), with capacity up to 300 lbs
  • (136 kg)
  • Optional 67965 Vacuum Scoop also available, for efficient capture of dust and debris.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Air Flow 64.0
    Height 5-1/4 Inch
    HP 2

entry.title: Dynabrade 68100 - Coolant Filtration System 230 V 1 Phase 60 Hz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Filtration
Price: 5161.68

[shortdesc]
  • Coolant Filtration System
  • 230 V, 1 Phase, 60 Hz
  • Superfinishing requires very clean coolant
  • If the coolant is not filtered, the grinding residue will act as an abrasive slurry, which can affect the final finish
  • Dynabrade?s Coolant Filtration System filters the coolant to 1?, eliminating this problem.
  • 2-stage filters to prevent 1-micron filter from clogging prematurely
  • 40 gallon tank ? removable for cleaning
  • Unit on casters for easy portability.
  • Compact construction
  • Transparent Tank for viewing coolant level
  • Easy access for changing filters
  • Self-priming Centrifugal Pump
  • GFCI protection.
    • [/shortdesc]

entry.title: Dynabrade Raptor 61450 - Raptor Vacuum Electric Portable Vacuum System
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Collectors & Accessories
Price: 15837.12

[shortdesc]
  • Raptor Vac Electric Portable Vacuum System
  • 5 lbs
  • (2.27 kg) into 6.25 Gal
  • (24 L), 20 A, 120 V 50/60 Hz, Division 1, N
  • America
  • Electric Portable Vacuum For use on metallic surfaces such as aluminum, magnesium, titanium, commercial alloys
  • Collects maximum of 5 lbs
  • (2.27 kg) of dust
  • Designed for dry-only source capture, where fine dust must be recovered
  • Legally certified as explosion-proof and dust ignition-proof
  • Includes HEPA H14 Filter with 99.995% efficiency on 0.3 micron
  • Filter is located downstream of the motor
  • Manual Filter Shaker (MFS) system.
  • Top-quality stainless steel body and 6.25 gallon (24 liter) recovery tank
  • Maximum 5 pounds (2.27 kg) of metal dust recovery
  • Easy one-click detaching and connecting of recovery tank
  • Unit is static-dissipating and conductive
  • Aerosol leak tested for quality assurance
  • Equipped with easy-glide cart and tool basket
  • Guaranteed for safe recovery of combustible/conductive dusts
  • Includes 96608 Conductive Cleaning Kit
  • Connect two tools simultaneously.Vacuum for use in:
    Group D:

entry.title: Dynabrade Raptor 61400 - Raptor Vacuum Electric Portable Vacuum System
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Collectors & Accessories
Price: 2914.49

[shortdesc]
  • Raptor Vac Electric Portable Vacuum System
  • 25 Gallon (94 L), 20 A, 120 V/60 Hz, M-Class, Poly Non-Conductive, Dry Only, N
  • America
  • Electric Portable Vacuum System for use on non-metallic surfaces such as wood, plastics
  • Designed for general source capture and dry cleanup only
  • 7.8' (238 cm) water static lift
  • 125 CFM (3,3521 L/Min) vacuum flow
  • Allows operation of two tools simultaneously
  • Vacuum starts automatically with startup of tool
  • Bypass Motor System uses environmental air to cool the motor and extend vacuum life
  • Industrial polycarbonate canister, 25 gallon (94 liter) capacity
  • This size allows filter to remain at substantial distance from collected debris, reducing clogging and extending motor life.
  • Includes a HEPA H13 Filter with 99.95 % efficiency on 0.3 micron
  • Automatic cleaning of filter
  • By connecting vacuum unit to external air supply, a blast of air is released to filter every 40 seconds of operation, to cyclically clean filter
  • Handy electric outlet on motor head allows for additional versatility in workplace
  • Convenient orange warning light indicates that filter needs replacement
  • Red warning light indicates protection device has been activated to prevent heat overload to motor
  • Connects to optional 61483 Cart
  • This unit requires a NEMA 5-20 Plug/Outlet
  • USA & Canada Certifications: UL Listed, M-Class

  • European Certifications: CE, EAC, M-Class.
  • Included: Two 20' (6 m) Non-Conductive Coaxial Hoses with Integrated Air Lines, ?Y? Connector, Two Composite Couplers, Two Vacuum Hose Swivel Adapters, Two Disposable Collection Bags.
  • Not included optional Cleaning Kit (96558): Vacuum Hose, 6' (1.8 m) length, Curved handle with two extensions, Round brush, Crevice Tool, Coarse nozzle attachment.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Origin Country United States

    Set Quantity 10
